description:
Creality Print is a self-developed Fused deposition modeling slicing software produced by Creality.

It's a practical and easy-to-use tool that can help you remote control and monitor your 3D printer and help print directly from your computer.
Features
- Adapt for Mac devices (x86 Inter chip).
- Flushing multiplier, upper limit, and minimum flushing volume adjustment.
- Optimization of calibration-related functions.
- The effects of overhang optimization (Beta) and Variable layer height can be applied simultaneously to a model.
Bugs
- Fixed an issue where special character paths caused printing anomalies.
- Fixed an issue with abnormal connection to the camera.
- Fixed the severe shrinkage layer issue caused by abnormal fan speed during color change in multi-color printing.
- Fixed the surface printing issue caused by extra inner wall paths on the top surfaces.
- Fix printing anomalies sent by the LAN printing (such as 2060 errors, coordinate errors, etc.)
